nodes.bodyText:
My only comment is regarding all the strings used through these changes.
Maybe we should use enums or constants to make them more consistent and easier to maintain.

Right. The only issue is that we would need one for each property of data query and event query objects. It would tightly couple the QueryKey directly to the analytics objects. I think it is more viable to decouple it and accept strings.
Revolving the conversation. No changes required.
